content: SafeDate

SafeDate is an online platform that helps people find restaurants that follow proper covid-19 protocols to ensure a safe dining experience. Users can search for a restaurant based on location, cuisine, and safety measures such as outdoor seating, contactless ordering, and social distancing.
Location-based search, Safety filter, Review system, Map view, Menu view
OpenTable, Yelp, TripAdvisor, Google Maps, Zomato
SafeDate prioritizes safety over other features such as ratings and reviews, and focuses solely on covid-19 safety measures.
TableReady

TableReady is a reservation app that allows users to book a table at a restaurant that follows proper covid-19 protocols. Users can select a restaurant based on safety measures such as outdoor seating, social distancing, and contactless ordering, and can book a table with just a few taps.
Reservation system, Safety filter, Contactless payment, Waitlist management, Push notifications
OpenTable, Resy, Yelp, SevenRooms, Reservations.com
TableReady emphasizes safety measures over other features such as table availability and restaurant ratings.
DineSafe

DineSafe is a certification program that ensures restaurants follow proper covid-19 protocols to ensure a safe dining experience. Restaurants can apply for certification and must meet strict safety requirements such as social distancing, contactless ordering, and regular sanitization. Users can search for certified restaurants through an online platform or a mobile app.
Certification program, Safety filter, Review system, Map view, Social media integration
SafeEats, EatWell, SafeDiningCertification, HealthGuard, GoodToGo
DineSafe provides a clear and trustworthy certification system that assures customers of a safe dining experience.
SafeBites

SafeBites is an online delivery platform that partners with restaurants that follow strict covid-19 protocols to ensure safe food delivery. Users can order food from a curated list of restaurants that prioritize safety measures such as contactless delivery, hygiene, and sanitization.
Restaurant partnerships, Online ordering, Safety filter, Contactless payment, Driver tracking
Uber Eats, Grubhub, DoorDash, Postmates, Deliveroo
SafeBites partners only with restaurants that prioritize safety measures, ensuring a safe food delivery experience.
pain_point_description: the individual is still concerned about covid-19 and wants to find a restaurant that follows the proper protocols such as social distancing, outdoor seating, or contactless ordering. they need a list of restaurants that prioritize their safety
audience_title: pick a good restaurant for a date
